page.title: 17Playing Baseball
page.content: During the summer term,the boys and girls in my school play baseball.There are league and cup competitions for the boys and the girls.The girl's matches are single innings,while the boys play matches of two innings.There is also a Town side made up of the best of all the schools.They play Gwent and Liverpool.Baseball is also played in the Secondary schools.Many of the older children also play for senior clubs. Cardiff is one of only a few areas that play Baseball.One of the best known sides in Senior Baseball,are{ {Llanrumney Youth Club}.They have been the most successful local side in the last few years. Baseball is played at International level.Each year Wales play England.The venue alternates yearly,between Liverpool,Cardiff or Newport.
